biases.name: BETRAYAL
biases.description: Chaos takes over Rekka as the population unleashes its wrath.
biases.headline: Rekka betrays its founding principles.
biases.text:
Be it due to international pressure or due to the birth of a cold and materialistic interest, the temporary government of Rekka has unilaterally decided to renounce its history and tradition and begin a process of constitution as a state, with a view to entering the international economy in a not-too-distant future.
    This decision is a direct attack to the self-organized roots of the Rekkan project. It seems that the current leaders have forgotten that their community was born as a response to the drifts of states like Dalme and Xaya; drifts into which the new Rekkan state could easily fall.

biases.name: PROGRESS
biases.description: Rekka has decided to constitute itself as a state.
biases.headline: Rekka, one step closer to joining the international community.
biases.text:
After decades of isolation, Rekka has abandoned its attempts at autocracy and has made the decision to constitute itself as a state, in order to fully integrate into the international community and, in the future, in global economy.
    It can be said that the country has reached a stage of maturity by distancing itself from the intentions of its founders, a counter-culture group that was born as a reaction to certain events that took place in Dalme and Xaya. Despite the romanticism of that project, history has shown that it was a utopian ideal that, fortunately, has metamorphosed into rational politics.
